article_title: MH370 Breakthrough Prompts Anger and Disbelief in China
article_text:
BEIJING—Chinese family members reacted with anger and disbelief Thursday after Malaysia Airlines declared a “major breakthrough” in the mystery of Flight 370, saying that debris recently discovered washed up on an Indian Ocean island belonged to the ill-fated plane.

The news comes after a 17-month wait for answers. Many Chinese family members said they had lost faith in official pronouncements and had grown increasingly critical of...

twitter.description: Many Chinese family members say they have lost faith in Malaysia Airlines and are left without emotional support and information.
twitter.creator: @tepingchen

article_summary:
Many Chinese family members said they had lost faith in official pronouncements and had grown increasingly critical of...
BEIJING—Chinese family members reacted with anger and disbelief Thursday after Malaysia Airlines declared a “major breakthrough” in the mystery of Flight 370, saying that debris recently discovered washed up on an Indian Ocean island belonged to the ill-fated plane.
The news comes after a 17-month wait for answers.
